attributes.action: allow all children to use the toilet freely without restricted time slots
attributes.additional_details: My son was given a detention for being late to his lesson, due to using the toilet. Endangering their health due to the risk of urinary tract infections or bowel complications.
attributes.background: to enforce a law stating that children have the right to use toilet facilities as and when is required without teachers stopping them.

rejection.details:
Decisions on policies regarding when students can leave the classroom are a matter for individual schools, not the UK Government or House of Commons.

As a result it is not possible for the Government or House of Commons to take the action you have requested.
